card.name: Arch-Cavalier
card.text: Vigilance Whenever this creature enters or attacks, tap up to one target creature.

card.name: Sailor of the Severed Strait
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, if it's equipped, draw a card.

card.name: Underbelly Uprising
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it and a creature you control. If you do, exile that card until that creature leaves the battlefield. Otherwise, that player discards a card.

card.name: Blow It Up
card.text: Blow It Up deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of items in your workshop. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither.)

card.name: Renegade Mechanic
card.text: Whenever a nontoken artifact enters under your control, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Regulate
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Spells that player casts cost {1} more to cast this turn.

card.name: Fleshripper Griffin
card.text: Pay 3 life: This creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Muck About
card.text: Mill three cards, then return an artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Metalcruncher
card.text: Trample When this creature enters, exile up to one target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Quicksilver Steed
card.text: You may have this creature enter as a copy of an artifact or creature you control, except it's a 2/2 blue Shapeshifter artifact creature in addition to its other types.

card.name: Nugget of Durendite
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. Then if your workshop is full, you may sacrifice this artifact. If you do, draw two cards. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither.)

card.name: Durendite-Plated Anvil
card.text: When this artifact enters, you may discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. {T}: Add {R}.

card.name: Servocrafting
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Search your library for an artifact creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Exile Servocrafting.

card.name: Banner Wings
Devastation Generator
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever this creature attacks, each player sacrifices a permanent. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature for each land sacrificed this way.

card.name: Traveling Apothecary
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. {T}: The next time a creature enters under your control this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Exo-Suit Foreman
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. At the beginning of your end step, if your workshop is full, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither.)

card.name: Rogue Bombardier
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, this creature deals 3 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Forbidden Research
card.text: Whenever this artifact or another artifact you control enters, up to one target artifact you control becomes a 3/3 black Demon creature in addition to its other types and gains haste. (That artifact is possessed indefinitely.)

card.name: House de Luc Loyalist
card.text: When this creature enters, search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Equipment you control have magnetize. (When it enters, either attach it to a creature you control or create a 1/1 Servo artifact creature token. Each instance triggers separately.)

card.name: Break-Laws, Servo Liberator
card.text: When Break-Laws enters, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Break-Laws dies, draw two cards.

card.name: Weapons Stockpile
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1. {7}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of this artifact. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Bishop of Transhumanism
card.text: Flying Sacrifice an artifact: Target permanent gains indestructible until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Prostheticycle
Iterated Evolution
card.text: Draw two cards and create two 0/0 colorless Servo Construct artifact creature tokens with "This token gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control".

card.name: The Mage-Beast of Erablis
card.text: The Mage-Beast of Erablis can't be blocked by Humans. Tap four other untapped permanents you control: You may put a +1/+1 counter on The Mage-Beast of Erablis. If you don't, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Debased Cavalier
card.text: This creature enters tapped. When this creature dies, if it was equipped, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Bile Troll
card.text: When this creature enters, exile target artifact creature card from your graveyard. Whenever this creature attacks, create a token that's a copy of a card exiled with it. It enters tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

card.name: Hulldog
card.text: When this creature enters, up to one target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of items in your workshop. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither.)

card.name: Drifting Hulk
card.text: When this creature enters, create a Treasure token. Treasures you control have "{T}, Pay 3 life, Sacrifice this Treasure: Add {B}{B}{B}."

card.name: Lumen Mite
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) When this creature enters, you may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Gatebreaker Hammer
Erablis Explorator
card.text: When this creature dies, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

card.name: Steel-Shell Tarasque
card.text: Spells you cast with mana value 5 or greater cost {2} less to cast. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, you gain 5 life.

card.name: Lurking Farmhand
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, choose one — • Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library. • Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Stasis Grenade
card.text: As this artifact enters, choose a nonland card name. (Token names aren't card names.) Activated abilities of permanents with the chosen name cost {2} more to activate. Creatures with the chosen name can't attack or block unless their controller pays {2} for each of those creatures.

card.name: Flood of Inspiration
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card and a noncreature permanent card each with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Overclocked Courier
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Prime Minister Marchant
card.text: Lifelink, menace {X}{X}{WB}: Marchant deals X damage to each opponent.

card.name: Explosive Experiment
card.text: Each player loses 1 life. Each opponent discards a card. Draw a card.

card.name: Abyssal Hydra
card.text: Ward—Pay an amount of life equal to this creature's power. When this creature enters, you may discard a card, pay 2 life, and/or exile three cards from your graveyard. For each cost you paid, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. (You can exile a card you discarded with this creature.)

card.name: Crapshoot
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile any number of cards from your graveyard. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card exiled this way. Search your library for a card and put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Mechanicus Maximus
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Mechanicus Maximus. When Mechanicus Maximus dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Gilded Champion
card.text: As long as it's your turn, this creature has protection from all colors. (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything that's one or more colors.)

card.name: Patriarch of House de Luc
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is its power. You may put a creature card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Tear the Veil
card.text: Exile all permanent cards from all graveyards. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put each permanent card exiled this way onto the battlefield under your control. Exile Tear the Veil.

card.name: Prestigious Horse
card.text: {U}: Put a flying counter on this creature. It becomes a Pegasus in addition to its other types. Activate only once. {1}{W}: Put two +1/1 counters on this creature. It becomes a Unicorn in addition to its other types. Activate only once.

card.name: Greywater Foundry
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only if your workshop is full. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither.)

card.name: Influx of Chaos
card.text: You gain X life. Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. Each opponent loses X life and discards X cards.

card.name: Tickelion
card.text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Activate only as a sorcery. Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature: It deals 1 damage to each opponent. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Eerie Watcher
card.text: {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard. {4}: Until your next turn, this artifact becomes an X/X Gargoyle artifact creature and gains flying, where X is the number of card types among cards exiled with this artifact. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Protothopter
card.text: Flash Flying When this creature enters, tap up to one target artifact or creature.

card.name: Rifled Crossbow
card.text: Flash Magnetize (When this Equipment enters, either attach it to a creature you control or create a 1/1 Servo artifact creature token.) Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1}

card.name: Amputator
card.text: Magnetize (When this Equipment enters, either attach it to a creature you control or create a 1/1 Servo artifact creature token.) Equipped creature gets +1/-1. When equipped creature dies, draw a card. Equip {2}

card.name: Icefall Gargoyle
card.text: Flying Icefall Gargoyle's power is equal to the number of items in your workshop. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither.)

card.name: Toy Soldiers
card.text: Create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens, then sacrifice an artifact.

card.name: Inventor's Desk
card.text: When this artifact enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a land card or a card with a mana ability from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Enille, the First Dragonborn
card.text: Noncreature artifacts lose all abilities. (Equipment stay attached, but do nothing.)

card.name: Gevau, the First Gnoll
card.text: As a nonbasic land enters, its controller may pay 2 life. If they don't, it enters tapped. {R}{R}: Gevau, the First Gnoll gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Chut, the First Nezumi
card.text: Flash When Chut enters, destroy target creature or planeswalker if one or more of its abilities have been activated this turn. Abilities of creatures and planeswalkers cost an additional 2 life to activate.

card.name: Tham, the First Merfolk
card.text: Ward {2} Whenever an opponent draws a card beyond the first drawn each turn, that player shuffles a card from their hand into their library.

card.name: Recul, the First Aven
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, choose one — • Exile target artifact or enchantment with mana value 3 or less. • Put a +1/+1 counter on Recul.

card.name: Luddism
card.text: Destroy all permanents with two or more permanent types and all permanents with two or more colors. (Permanent types include artifact, battle, creature, enchantment, planeswalker, and land.)

card.name: Artisan's Boots
Bad Batch
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you controlled it, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token and draw a card.

card.name: Here Comes the Train
card.text: Create a number of 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens equal to the number of items in your workshop. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither.) Artifact creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Parliament Guards
card.text: Double strike

card.name: Grapple
card.text: Grapple can't be countered by ward abilities. Grapple deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Preacher of the Machine
card.text: Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+0. Equip costs you pay cost {1} less. Noncreature, non-Equipment artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Engine Hauler
card.text: This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. When this creature dies, draw a card.

card.name: Engine of War
card.text: If this creature would deal combat damage to a permanent or player, it deals X times that much damage to that permanent or player instead, where X is one plus the number of permanents attached to this creature.

card.name: Prototype Handcannon
Boulder Lugger
card.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other artifact creature you control.

card.name: Democratic Processor
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you have more less life than an opponent, you gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Unionized Worker
card.text: This creature's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of items in your workshop. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither. This counts itself.)

card.name: Mobile Jail
card.text: When this artifact enters, exile up to one other target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to the number of items in your workshop until this artifact leaves the battlefield. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither.)

card.name: Power Sword
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each item in your workshop. (Workshops consist of up to one each of an Equipment, an artifact creature, and an artifact that's neither.) Equip {1}

card.name: Servo Construct ORD
card.text: This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control. (Including itself.)

card.name: Treasure ORD
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Blade-Leg Automaton
card.text: When this artifact enters, choose one — • This artifact becomes a 3/3 Spider artifact creature. • This artifact becomes an Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +3/+0" and "Equip {1}". • Draw three cards, then discard two cards.

card.name: Towering Warlord
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each Equipment you control, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. Then for each Equipment you control, you may attach it to a creature you control.

card.name: Mirrormuck
card.text: When this creature enters, if it isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of it. Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Deep-Sea Salvager
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses life equal to the number of noncreature, nonland cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Into the Furnace
card.text: Destroy up to one target artifact. Into the Furnace deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Durendite Railblazer
card.text: When this creature enters or attacks, sacrifice up to three permanents. Create that many 3/3 colorless Train artifact creature tokens.

card.name: Armor-Piercing Shot
card.text: Choose one — • Armor-Piercing Shot deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. • Destroy target Aura or Equipment.

card.name: Whimsical Scholar
card.text: When this creature enters, create a Clue token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.") {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

card.name: Stab
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Cybernetic Zealot
card.text: During your turn, this creature has first strike. As long as this creature is equipped, it gets +1/+1.

card.name: In Need of Repair
card.text: Choose one — • Target artifact or enchantment you control gains indestructible until end of turn. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment you don't control.

card.name: Resourceful Ironmonger
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 0/0 colorless Servo Construct artifact creature token with "This token gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control". Sacrifice this creature: Artifact creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Winged Admiral
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Winged Admiral. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Monster Anatomist
card.text: Lifelink When this creature enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand, then exile each opponent's graveyard.

card.name: Wrath of the Monstrous
card.text: Wrath of the Monstrous deals 3 damage to each creature, planeswalker, and battle.

card.name: Veteran of Erablis
card.text: Equipment and equipped creatures you control have indestructible as long as it's your turn.
